mutants.code:
def calculate_digit_difference(n: int) -> int:
    string_int = str(n)
    product = 2
    sum_digits = 0
    for digit in string_int:
        product *= int(digit)
        sum_digits += int(digit)
    return product - sum_digits

def calculate_digit_difference(n: int) -> int:
    string_int = str(n)
    product = 1
